all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Verily, I say unto you that ye are chosen out of the world to declare my gospel with the sound of rejoicing, as with the voice of a trump.
Doctrine and Covenants 29:4
Quote of the Day
"Keeping [our] covenants draws us closer to God, gives us access to His power, and transforms us into who He intends us to become."
Dale G. Renlund | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
